title: JohnnyLVC
author: JohnnyLVC
content: I like the term do it yourself when things are broken at home and I am trying to fix them myself. I loved to do technical work at home. One time I was fixing the electric board, but I failed to do so, and the electricity of the house went off. Then I called an  emergency electrician to fix this problem.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: Doing it yourself is great, so we can know how to fix it. but still we must be careful, and we must have guides. And you are very brave to fix the electric board. greatüëç

comments.author: Dhrugtest
comments.body: Doing something great to your self but the other hands too you need support from other hands to accomplish your goal.

comments.author: JohnnyLVC
comments.body: Yes, you are correct, but in order to solve it myself, I'm trying to get a little technical. I was smitten.
